title: Uniswap goes live on BNB Chain - CryptoTvplus
content:
BNB chain has announced the integration of Uniswap, the most popular decentralized exchange system by trade volume, which is now operational on BNB Chain. The Uniswap Protocol v3 has been implemented successfully on the BNB Chain after receiving 66% of voter support.

As of February 2023, more than 55 million UNI token holders voted in favor, a governance request by 0x Plasma Labs to implement Uniswap v3 on BNB Chain was approved. Shortly before this, in a Temperature Check vote, Wormhole was selected as the Protocol’s designated bridge to the BNB Chain.

The addition of the BNB Chain is anticipated to bring about several important benefits, including an increase in users, decreased fees, and the opening up of new geographic markets. Users are also provided with better and more affordable trading choices as a result of this action.

Additionally, the transition to BNB Chain is expected to improve the Uniswap Protocol’s capacity to better serve all users inside the Web3 domain and it represents an important step toward enhancing accessibility and liquidity for its users.

Speaking on this, the Director of Growth at BNB Chain Innovation, Alvin Kan said that with BNB Chain’s robust and committed community, scalability, and accessibility, it is a suitable launchpad for web3-related services, where protocols seeking a wider reach can grow. He also expresses the team’s delight to see Uniswap’s ongoing dedication to providing value to its consumers and laying the groundwork for the decentralization of the future.

The expected outcome of this transition

Uniswap Protocol users can now enjoy BNB Chain’s quick transactions and low transaction costs when trading and swapping tokens across the network. The integration also enables Uniswap to access a new source of liquidity and the substantial DeFi developer community of BNB Chain, as well as to raise awareness and encourage adoption among institutional and retail investors, potentially adding 1-2 million new users and participants to the Protocol.

The debut is timely since it satisfies the DeFi sector’s demand for better accessibility and interoperability across blockchains. With the deployment of Uniswap Protocol on the BNB Chain, it will be able to take a bigger chunk of the expanding DeFi industry.

As more people join the ecosystem to benefit from what DeFi has to offer, it is anticipated that the launch will accelerate the expansion of both Uniswap and BNB Chain.

Read also;

title: How to Invest in the Space ID (ID) IEO on Binance? - CoinCodex
content:
How to Invest in the Space ID (ID) IEO on Binance?

Binance has announced that Space ID (ID) will be the next project featured on the Binance Launchpad platform. To become eligible for participating in the token sale, users need to hold BNB tokens on the Binance cryptocurrency exchange. Binance will start recording BNB balances on March 2, and will be doing so until March 9. The Space ID team is looking to raise $2.5 million by selling 5% of the token's total supply. The ID tokens will be sold at the equivalent of $0.0025 each (the price will be set in BNB).

Space ID is a project that’s focused on digital identities and domains for the web3 space. The Space ID platform allows users to register, trade and manage web3 domains, which are human-readable identities that are much more convenient to use than standard cryptocurrency addresses. The Space ID ecosystem supports web3 name services such as .eth, .bnb and .arb and boasts integrations with notable projects including BSCScan, Trust Wallet and others.

Here's a quick recap of the timeline for the Space ID sale:

Start End Preparation period March 17 (00:00 AM UTC) March 22 (06:00 AM UTC) Subscription period March 22 (06:00 AM UTC) March 22 (09:00 AM UTC) Calculation period March 22 (09:00 AM UTC) March 22 (10:00 AM UTC) Final token distribution March 22 (10:00 AM UTC) n/a

How to invest in the Space ID IEO on Binance Launchpad?

The Space ID sale on Binance Launchpad is available to users from supported countries. You will also have to hold some BNB and verify your BNB account if you want to participate.

1. Create an account on Binance

The first step for participating in the token sale is to create an account on Binance.

Sign up to Binance

How to buy Binance Coin (BNB) on Binance?

After you successfully register, go to the Launchpad section of the navigation menu. Now, you can see all the completed and upcoming IEOs on Binance.

2. Verify your account

In order to participate in Binance Launchpad IEOs, you have to pass a know your customer (KYC) process. This is done to verify your identity and location, as residents of some countries are prohibited from buying tokens on Binance Launchpad.

We have already covered Binance’s identity verification process in another guide. If you have any questions about the KYC process on Binance, you can find a step-by-step guide on the link below:

How and Why you Should do KYC on Binance?

3. Select the Space ID IEO

After you're verified, select Space ID from the list of upcoming and completed Binance Launchpad token sales.

4. Space ID IEO requirements

Binance introduced a new Launchpad subscription format that allows BNB holders to commit an amount of BNB towards a token sale, where their final allocation of the new token is determined by the ratio of their committed BNB against the total committed BNB by all participating users. To ensure a fair allocation for all participants, we will be setting a max cap of token allocation per user.

In order to be eligible for the Space ID IEO, you have to complete the identity verification process, accept the token purchase agreement, and be a resident of a supported country. Residents of these countries are not allowed to participate in the Space ID IEO:

Belarus, People's Republic of China, Democratic Republic of Congo, Cuba, Iraq, Iran, North Korea, Singapore, Sudan, Syria, United States of America and its territories (American Samoa, Guam, the Northern Mariana Islands, Puerto Rico, and the U.S. Virgin Islands), Zimbabwe.

If you pass all of these requirements, you can participate in the Space ID IEO and acquire ID tokens at the token sale price.

5. Space ID IEO Subscription Timeline

Here's how the timeline for the ID token sale on Binance Launchpad will work, as explained by Binance:

March 17 (00:00 AM UTC) - March 22 (06:00 AM UTC) - Preparation period: In this phase, Binance takes hourly snapshots of the BNB holdings of each user. A user's average balance across these snapshots is used to determine how much BNB they can commit to the ID token sale.

In this phase, Binance takes hourly snapshots of the BNB holdings of each user. A user's average balance across these snapshots is used to determine how much BNB they can commit to the ID token sale. March 22 (06:00 AM UTC) - March 22 (09:00 AM UTC) - Subscription period: In this phase, users can subscribe to the ID token sale on Binance Launchpad. If users do decide to commit BNB to the sale, they must sign the Token Purchase Agreement.

Important:

Please note that once committed, your BNB will be locked and you will not be able to redeem or access any other functions such as transfers, withdrawals or trading until final token distribution.

March 22 (09:00 AM UTC) - March 22 (10:00 AM UTC) - Calculation Period: Subscriptions are closed, and the exchange calculates how many tokens will be distributed to each user.

Subscriptions are closed, and the exchange calculates how many tokens will be distributed to each user. March 22 (10:00 AM UTC) - Final Token Distribution: The appropriate amount of BNB is deducted from the user's committed BNB and the user receives ID tokens.

Sign up to Binance

6. Conclusion

Binance announced that the subscription format will not be limited to Launchpad sessions going forward. It may be used for new listings, allowing users to purchase already-circulating tokens at a discount prior to the start of trading. For that reason, Binance may use average BNB balances calculated for a period prior to the time an announcement is made. For additional details, head over to the Binance support page.

Check out the performance of some of the previously completed IEOs on Binance.

*Data based on snapshot taken on March 16, 2023 at 16:00 PM (UTC)

title: Bitcoin Holds Steady Above $24.5K as European Banking Crisis Eases - CoinDesk
content: The largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization was trading at $24,791, up 1.4% over the past 24 hours, according to CoinDesk data. BTC has remained largely range-bound between $24,000 and $25,000 since Tuesday afternoon when U.S. inflation data took a slight turn for the better. BTC is up 19% over the week amid renewed market optimism about the U.S. banking sector and the Federal Reserve potentially suspending its current regime of interest rate hikes.
